body:
Incorporated spack community review comments

Review - https://github.com/spack/spack/pull/17392

amdblis:
* Removed function which invokes explicity make check

amdfftw:
* Rephrased spack product description
* Removed duplicate function used in base fftw

amdlibflame:
* Rephrased spack product description.
* Factor the differences under configure function with spack super function.

Closes #17392
Closes #15660
title: Added optimized version of Blis, FFTW and Libflame for AMD
